关于

 Name：location.host.split(".")[1]
 Age：[弱冠，而立];····;距80岁仅剩55年
 City：112°E，34°N
 Class：农民阶级
 Career：语言文字工作者||学生||儿子||在外务工人员
 Occupation：你是学计算机的吗 ？ 我不是 : 我是
 Description：比较笨||现实的理想实主义者||唯物的唯心主义者||曾经是文科生的工科生
               ||一个没有意思到有意思的人||四体不勤、五谷不分、上不知天文、下不知地理
 Blog：所有文章均为未完成状态，所有技术类文章仅为己用;
 Dream：Make money to realize my dream
 Ideal：Having meals and not starving; Having houses and sleeping well;
        Having clothes and dress properly。I can realize my individual and social value maximization on this basis.
 Love：Reading/Watching/Listening/Thinking || !Hate
 Did：The only thing that can be made sure was to bron (biologically)
 Doing：Threatneed by death,attracted by life
 Will：根据相关法律法规和政策，该结果未予显示
 Thanks：Thanks for who loved me and the ones I loving
 Epitaph：不及卢家有莫愁;had comed,may be had lived.
